page.title: 11Alstonfield Vandalism/School
page.content:
{Vandalism in Alstonefield} Visitors to Alstonefield sometimes knock down walls, damage grassland, hurt wildlife, chase farm animals until they die of exhaustion, leave gates open allowing animals to roam free and perhaps be knocked over by cars or hurt in some other way, let their dogs off their leads, allowing them to chase sheep and hens and generally be a pest to all the village.
{School closed at Alstonefield} Most children from Alstonefield go to Warslow First and Middle Schools. They used to go to St. Peter's School in Alstonefield. The school closed in 12, because there were not enough children going there. This affected the village in that the children had to go to another school and there would be no more social meeting.
